name: XMLDTD
desc: A representation of a Document Type Definition.

items.name: init(contentsOf: URL, options: XMLNode.Options)
items.desc: Initializes and returns an NSXMLDTD object created from the DTD declarations in a URL-referenced source.

items.name: init(data: Data, options: XMLNode.Options)
items.desc: Initializes and returns an NSXMLDTD object created from the DTD declarations encapsulated in an NSData object

items.name: func addChild(XMLNode)
items.desc: Adds a child node to the end of the list of existing children.

items.name: func insertChild(XMLNode, at: Int)
items.desc: Inserts a child node in the receiver’s list of children at a specific location in the list.

items.name: func insertChildren([XMLNode], at: Int)
items.desc: Inserts an array of child nodes at a specified location in the receiver’s list of children.

items.name: func removeChild(at: Int)
items.desc: Removes the child node at a particular location in the receiver’s list of children.

items.name: func replaceChild(at: Int, with: XMLNode)
items.desc: Replaces a child at a particular index with another child.

items.name: func setChildren([XMLNode]?)
items.desc: Removes all existing children of the receiver and replaces them with an array of new child nodes.

items.name: class func predefinedEntityDeclaration(forName: String) -> XMLDTDNode?
items.desc: Returns a DTD node representing the predefined entity declaration with the specified name.

items.name: func elementDeclaration(forName: String) -> XMLDTDNode?
items.desc: Returns the DTD node representing an element declaration for a specified element.

items.name: func attributeDeclaration(forName: String, elementName: String) -> XMLDTDNode?
items.desc: Returns the DTD node representing an attribute-list declaration for a given attribute and its element.

items.name: func entityDeclaration(forName: String) -> XMLDTDNode?
items.desc: Returns the DTD node representing the entity declaration for a specified entity.

items.name: func notationDeclaration(forName: String) -> XMLDTDNode?
items.desc: Returns the DTD node representing the notation declaration identified by the specified notation name.
